metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23958 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The browser could have been confused into transferring a screen sharing state into another tab, which would leak unintended information. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 85.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '85.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
